thread.title: NJ Transit’s Next Challenge: Boost Morale

author: Paul Berger
title: NJ Transit’s Next Challenge: Boost Morale
text:
Staff morale doesn’t figure in NJ Transit’s budgets or on-time performance charts, but the agency’s next leader will need to focus on it to turn things around.
That is according to people familiar with NJ Transit as the agency looks to the future following Executive Director Steven Santoro’s announcement on Thursday that he is stepping down.
